channel.title: [PI] Door trouble (No I didn't walk into it)
channel.description:
I almost walked into it though...
I'm using a PI server base and for some reason the way the doors are lay out is terrible, for example in falador on the server the door with object ID 11711 (And 11712) opens and closes fine, no problems, but there is no code in ActionHandler.java:
case 11712: case 11711:
However when on my other door I use
case 11707: Server.objectHandler.doorHandling(objectType, c.objectX, c.objectY, 0);
It doesn't work at all, what the hell?

I’m using a PI server base and for some reason the way the doors are lay out is terrible, for example in falador on the server the door with object ID 11711 (And 11712) opens and closes fine, no problems, but there is no code in ActionHandler.java:

case 11712:
case 11711:

However when on my other door I use

It doesn’t work at all, what the hell?
